comments:
When attempting to open an .override file in the Override editor, the following
error occurs:

Plug-in org.eclipse.jem.ui was unable to load class
org.eclipse.ui.editors.text.TextEditor.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.eclipse.ui.editors.text.TextEditor
at
org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findClass(BundleLoader.java:359)

Looks to me like the solution is adding org.eclipse.ui.editors as a required
plug-in for org.eclipse.jem.ui.
The fix has been released to HEAD.
